blogPost.excerpt: Resold is a marketplace for people to buy & sell with same-day delivery. 1. List a piece of furniture on Resold 2. Request an Uber driver to have your furniture delivered in minutes. 3. Payment is delivered direct to your bank account.
blogPost.body: Resold is a marketplace for people to buy & sell with same-day delivery. 1. List a piece of furniture on Resold 2. Request an Uber driver to have your furniture delivered in minutes. 3. Payment is delivered direct to your bank account.
blogPost.title: Resold - Buy & sell with same-day delivery
blogPost.author: Joe Kuczek

localize.description: 转售是人们买卖当天送货的市场。1.将一件家具列入转售清单2.要求优步司机在几分钟内将家具送货。3.付款会直接送到您的银行账户。
轉售是人們買賣當天送貨的市場。1.將一件傢俱列入轉售清單2.要求優步司機在幾分鐘內將傢俱送貨。3.付款會直接送到您的銀行賬戶。

previous.excerpt: Laguna lets you create an up-to-date personal page for your stock trades and holdings. Perfect for keeping your fin-friends & family updated, building your influencer following, dropping in your linktr.ee, or using for your fintech newsletter.
previous.title: Laguna - OnlyFans for your stock portfolio

localize.description: 拉古纳可以让你为你的股票交易和持股创建一个最新的个人页面。非常适合让你的FIN朋友和家人保持最新，建立你的影响力追随者，在你的Linktr.ee上留言，或者用在你的金融科技时事通讯上。
localize.tagline: 仅适用于您的股票投资组合的风扇

localize.description: 拉古納可以讓你爲你的股票交易和持股創建一個最新的個人頁面。非常適合讓你的FIN朋友和家人保持最新，建立你的影響力追隨者，在你的Linktr.ee上留言，或者用在你的金融科技時事通訊上。
localize.tagline: 僅適用於您的股票投資組合的風扇

next.excerpt: For too long, early stage startups have been a walled garden, so we decided to build a door. 🚪 (1) Over text message, tell us what you're looking for (2) We'll monitor for matching jobs (3) We'll connect you with the founding team when there's a match
next.title: Pearl - An SMS hiring network for the startup world

localize.description: 太久以来，早期创业公司一直是一座有围墙的花园，所以我们决定建一扇门。🚪(1)通过短信告诉我们您在寻找什么(2)我们将监控是否有匹配的工作(3)当有匹配的工作时，我们会为您接通创始团队
localize.tagline: 面向初创企业的短信招聘网络

localize.description: 太久以來，早期創業公司一直是一座有圍牆的花園，所以我們決定建一扇門。🚪(1)通過短信告訴我們您在尋找什麼(2)我們將監控是否有匹配的工作(3)當有匹配的工作時，我們會爲您接通創始團隊
localize.tagline: 面向初創企業的短信招聘網絡
